description: Although somewhat dusty, the shop is otherwise tidily kept, its interior lit with simple lanterns that hang from several beams in the ceiling.  A single wide row of wooden racks stretches across the center of the floor, its upright fixtures holding up baskets filled with various flowers.  On the far wall, just behind a long counter, a sliding panel is affixed in the open position.  Windows placed high up on the walls allow a glimpse of the starlit sky outside.

Although somewhat dusty, the shop is otherwise tidily kept.  A single wide row of wooden racks stretches across the center of the floor, its upright fixtures holding up baskets filled with various flowers.  On the far wall, just behind a long counter, a sliding panel is affixed in the open position, allowing a view of the field of flora sprouting into bloom outside.  Windows placed high up on the walls allow sunlight to stream into the shop to bathe the wares in a pale golden glow.
title: [Grawood Flowers]
